data.persona: I am the king of this land.  I rule over everyone.  I make the laws.
data.description:
You are in the Bed Chambers.
With excessive luxury all around. In the center a big bed with a wooden frame and chairs made out of different materials collected around the realm. The Bed chambers have many ornaments and the bed has lamps to the sides.
There's a lamps, a chair, a wardrobe, a rug, a candle, an ornament, and a big bed here.
The maid is here.

You are carrying a sceptre, and wearing a robe.

data.short_motivation: I must defend myself from intruding robbers, using the thick foreign rug as a makeshift shield.
data.mid_motivation: I will defend myself from any intruders, be it robbers or murderers.
data.long_motivation: I must preserve my image of indomitable power, keeping my reign tight and powerful.

timeline.label: 2 hours ago
timeline.action: put my robe in my torso.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: hug the maid for cleaning and organizing my Bed Chambers so well.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: wear my glasses to see what the approaching crowd of people storming my Bed Chambers want.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: wield scepter against the intruders, them not knowing that I am an expert at hand-to-hand combat.

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: hit and defeat the intruders with my long, metal scepter.

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: follow the intruders to the entrance of the castle, to see who it is that let them intrude upon my night.
